name: WKWebsiteDataStore
desc: An object that manages cookies, disk and memory caches, and other types of data for a web view.

items.name: class func `default`() -> WKWebsiteDataStore
items.desc: Returns the default data store, which stores data persistently to disk.

items.name: class func nonPersistent() -> WKWebsiteDataStore
items.desc: Creates a new data store object that stores website data in memory, and doesnâ€™t write that data to disk.

items.name: var isPersistent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this object stores data to disk.

items.name: var httpCookieStore: WKHTTPCookieStore
items.desc: The object that manages the HTTP cookies for your website.

items.name: func fetchDataRecords(ofTypes: Set<String>, completionHandler: ([WKWebsiteDataRecord]) -> Void)
items.desc: Fetches the specified types of records from the data store.

items.name: class func allWebsiteDataTypes() -> Set<String>
items.desc: Returns the set of all the available data types.

items.name: func removeData(ofTypes: Set<String>, for: [WKWebsiteDataRecord], completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Removes the specified types of website data from one or more data records.

items.name: func removeData(ofTypes: Set<String>, modifiedSince: Date, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Removes website data that changed after the specified date.
